title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.21 - Accident reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.21 - Accident reports

State Regulations

Immediate notice of the following accidents must be sent
by telegraph or telephone to the Department of Transportation, Albany, N.Y.: (a) all explosions of locomotive
boilers or steam reservoirs; (b) all accidents to locomotive boilers or steam reservoirs resulting in death or
injury of any person; (c) all
accidents to locomotive boilers in which the crown sheet is ruptured or pulled
away from the crown sheet bolts or radial stays, whether personal injuries are
sustained or not. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
